venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
In his readings, Edgar Cayce tells us that,
at the superconscious level, we can gain
access to the Akashic Records, a chronicle
of everything that has ever been thought,
said, or done by everyone who has ever lived.

The Akashic Records, also referred to in the
reading as the 'Book of Life' or the 'Book of
God's Remembrance', can be thought of as
the revelation of the Creator's all-encompassing
wisdom and knowledge.

Tonight, explore your Records and discover
answers to questions you may have about
your life.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: HYPNOSIS SEMINAR : Akashic Records Exploration
